text:
="preserve">Guillermo Soberón Acevedo (29 December 1925 – 12 October 2020) was a Mexican politician, chemist, physician and educator. He was born in Iguala, Guerrero. Between 1973 to 1981, he was rector of the National Autonomous University of Mexico. From 1982 to 1988, he was Secretary of Health during the Miguel de la Madrid presidency.
Soberón Acevedo died on 12 October 2020 in Mexico City at the age of 94.
